meanings: (예를 표함) [명사] greeting, (formal) salutation, (절) bow [동사] (만났을 때) greet, say hello, (헤어질 때) say goodbye, (허리...
(감사 인사) [동사] thank[give thanks to] (sb for sth), express[offer] one's thanks[gratitude] (to sb for sth)
(직원의 임용·해임·평가와 관계되는 일)personnel matters[affairs], human resources affairs

vlive.english: Shall we say to hi to all our audience?

examples.korean: She waved bye-bye and got into the car. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 손을 흔들어 작별 인사를 하고 차에 올라탔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She waved bye-bye and got into the car. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He bowed and gallantly kissed my hand. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 머리 숙여 인사를 하더니 정중히 내 손에 입을 맞추었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He bowed and gallantly kissed my hand. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She said goodbye and scurried back to work. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 작별 인사를 하고 다시 종종걸음을 치며 일을 하러 갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She said goodbye and scurried back to work. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She said goodbye and thanked us for coming. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 작별 인사를 하며 우리에게 와 줘서 고맙다고 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She said goodbye and thanked us for coming. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She began by thanking us all for coming. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 우리 모두에게 와 줘서 고맙다는 인사로 말을 시작했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She began by thanking us all for coming. Add to Wordbook
